summary: Bioinformatics Lab is a comprehensive course designed to build strong foundational knowledge in this important area. This subject covers 6 key modules that progressively develop your understanding. You'll gain both theoretical insights and practical skills through lectures and assignments. The course prepares you for advanced studies and professional applications. Mastering this subject will significantly contribute to your academic and career success.
recommended_books: Molecular Biology of the Cell – Alberts et al.
Bioinformatics: Sequence and Genome Analysis – Mount
course_outcomes: Use bioinformatics databases and tools for sequence analysis.
Implement sequence alignment algorithms like Needleman-Wunsch.
Apply BLAST and ClustalW for biological sequence comparison.
Construct phylogenetic trees and perform motif finding.
Analyze protein families and structural biology data.
prerequisites: Basic knowledge of Biology and Programming
